page.title: 10BRIDGE BARN FARM.
page.content: Mr Brown is a tenant of the farm which is owned by Warwickshire County Council.His farm covers aproximately 93 acres.Mr and Mrs Brown work on the farm and they have no employees so they have no wages bill.They live on the farm.Their main commodity is milk. They also produce beef and corn.They have 47 pedigree{Jersey}cows and keep 112 beef cattle that are{Angus Cross}. Mr Brown doesnt want any changes to the farm.For Channel Island milk he is paid 18p per litre.A new tractor would cost Â£10,000 and a large one Â£50,000. All the cows are home bred.Mr Brown chose Jersey cows because he'd worked with them all his life.A cow in milk costs Â£400.For a pedigree bull it would cost Â£8_900 but Mr Brown doesn't keep a bull.
